title: Rewards
body: I'm confused with the rewards.  I'm silver V 0 LP and if I get demoted to bronze now, I don't get rewards as a silver or what? {{item:3151}}  I know that officialy season ended in November 11th. But really want to know that. Thanks for any help.

replies.body:
Hey FaikeManoKraujas, 

You will still receive your Silver border and it wont change now that the season ends. You're now in preseason and if anything its preparing your MMR for your placements. 

Hope this helps. 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
